name: IH8Zombies - hand drawn/3D 3rd person shooter - iPhone/iPod, Droid and consoles (Canceled)
blurb: A shooter video game combining action, comedy and drama.  Visually stunning.  Pulse-pounding.  Finishing on iPhone, plans for Droid and consoles.

rewards.reward: Individual.  Get your name listed in the iPhone app's acknowledgments as a financial contributor.

Individual.  Get your name listed as a Fan of Hero in the app acknowledgments.  Get your own exclusive article on Hero's fanpage on Facebook.  Provide us a photo, we will airbrush you in with Hero and post the graphic with a short story/post.  You are, of course, welcomed to keep a digital copy of the final artwork for yourself.

Individual.  See $20 + you receive exclusive ability to suggest an activity (within reason) to do with Hero.  Provide us a photo of you and we will create a graphic with you and Hero doing an activity on the fanpage along with a writeup on Hero's wall.
Individual.  $30 rewards + a limited edition, signed print from the stack of development sketchbooks.

Organizations / Corporations.  Your entity listed as a "Sponsor" in the acknowledgments, and a custom photo / post on Hero's fanpage.  We can airbrush your team into a drawing with Hero; we can have Hero feature your product in one of his adventures posted on the fanpage... this is open to creativity.

Individual.  $60 rewards + your name featured in the game "With Special Thanks To ____ ".  Your name will be added to a list of $100+ contributors.  When the player starts the game, the screen will fade to black, the game will select a different name from the list on each play, then fade up with the message "With Special Thanks To  < insert name > ".  If 10 people contribute $100, then 10% of the time, players will see your name!

Organizations / Corporations.  $75 rewards + provide us your entity name, logo, URL.  These will be put in a list of $150 contributors.  On each gameplay, the game will select the next contributor from that list and feature your organization exclusively under the heading: "With the Sponsorship of  < insert organization name >".  Especially if you target the game's demographic, this would be an exceptional value.
